mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectDetailMyPage * Description : mypage 상세조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT USR_ID , USR_NM , PWD , BLN_NM , DEPT_NM , RSP_BSN_NM , PST_NM , AUT_ID , CPN , USR_EXPR_DT , USE_YN , ENCP_USE_YN , FRST_REG_DTM , LST_MDF_DTM FROM T_USR_I WHERE USR_ID = #{usr_id}
mapper.insert: /** * Query ID : updateTranPwd * Description : 수정 * Author : 김주영 **/ WITH UPSERT AS( UPDATE T_TRANS_ENCRYPT SET SALT_KEY = #{salt_value}, TRANS_CHK_KEY = #{pwd}, LST_MDFR_ID = #{lst_mdfr_id}, LST_MDF_DTM = clock_timestamp() WHERE TRANS_ID = #{usr_id} RETURNING * ) INSERT INTO T_TRANS_ENCRYPT ( TRANS_ID, TRANS_CHK_KEY, SALT_KEY, FRST_REGR_ID, FRST_REG_DTM, LST_MDFR_ID, LST_MDF_DTM ) SELECT #{usr_id}, #{pwd}, #{salt_value}, #{lst_mdfr_id}, clock_timestamp(), #{lst_mdfr_id}, clock_timestamp() WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM UPSERT )
